name: Settlement Cost Of Sales Primary
description: the total amount of costs accrued for material, labor/burden, and freight, including costs for outside services (external contract labor) but excluding internal labor, incurred as part of the given delivery of projects or services (such as product installation â€” not a ""ship and bill"" transaction for a physical product, per Rockwell Automation revenue recognition rules), stored as a decimal in the currency specified by the COPA Record Currency Code
Internal labor is accrued in Settlement Cost Of Sales Secondary.
